channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Nvidia’s stock can hit $190 as ‘generational opportunity’ unfolds, says BofA
item.description: Nvidia’s free cash flow in the coming years could rival Apple’s, one analyst said.

item.title: You're Not Paranoid. The Market Is Out to Get You.
Netflix’s stock is gaining — but investors should get ready for the new reality
item.description: One analyst saw subscriber performance as the biggest highlight of Netflix’s report. But he reminded investors that this metric is going away early ne...

item.title: I'm Way Too Young for Estate Planning. Or Am I?
item.description: I thought planning for death or injury was something I wouldn’t have to worry about for many years. But the truth is that anybody over 18 should consi...

item.title: Activist Investor to Push French-Fry Maker Lamb Weston to Explore a Sale
item.description: Jana Partners, which is working with Continental Grain on the investment, may seek board seats.

item.title: A Mystery $30 Million Wave of Pro-Trump Bets Has Moved a Popular Prediction Market
item.description: Four Polymarket accounts have systematically placed frequent bets on a Trump election victory.

item.title: Schlumberger’s stock slumps as falling oil prices turn customers cautious
item.description: Schlumberger’s stock slumps after revenue misses expectations amid “cautious spending” by some international customers as oil prices fell.

item.title: Amex sees strong discretionary spending, but stock retreats after solid 2024 run
item.description: The company says new member benefits are resonating with younger generations.

item.title: U.S. Stocks Mixed; Netflix Jumps on Earnings

item.title: 10-year Treasury yield slips from highest since July after housing starts drop
